definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Days are coloured bubbles that float upon the surface of fathomless night.
sentences.chinese: 白晝是色彩繽紛的浮沫，於深邃的夜色中浮蕩。

sentences.english: He'll never fade, like the daytime mirages.
sentences.chinese: 他決不會像白晝的海市蜃樓一樣逐漸消逝。

sentences.english: By day the LORD commands his steadfast love;
sentences.chinese: 白晝耶和華必向我施慈愛。

sentences.english: When Rhaegal roared, a gout of yellow flame turned darkness into day for half a heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 當雷哥怒吼時，一瞬間一股黃焰將黑暗變成白晝。

sentences.english: Your hearts know in silence the secrets of the days and the nights.
sentences.chinese: 你們的心靈在沉默中獲知白晝黑夜的祕密。

sentences.english: And see the brave day sunk in hideous night.
The night probably knew more of him than the day.
sentences.chinese: 他的來歷，黑夜也許要比白晝知道得更清楚些。

sentences.english: Cease, dreams, the images of our day-desires.
sentences.chinese: 停止吧，夢靨，白晝慾望的化身。

sentences.english: The soldiers crept forward under the cover of darkness.
sentences.chinese: 士兵在白晝的迴護下向前匍匐。

sentences.english: In the summer, when it's always light, she'll sometimes run as late as midnight.
sentences.chinese: 夏季白晝較長時，她有時甚至會在午夜跑步。

sentences.english: Cryin'in the night, the night goes in to.
sentences.chinese: 我在暗夜中哭泣，盼不到白晝的來臨。

sentences.english: This is ideal for Day Outings, Fishing and Waterskiing.
sentences.chinese: 實用於白晝外出遠足，釣魚，滑水。

sentences.english: Daylight came from in the night.
No day, no night, no moment.
Eosophobia- Fear of dawn or daylight.
The day , with the noise of this little earth , drowns the silence of all worlds.
sentences.chinese: 白晝用這卑微人世的塵囂，蓋過了宇宙諸天的寂靜。

definition: (of a city etc) ablaze with lights
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
long dark night/fig. long period of misery and oppression
11 pm-1 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
to talk in one's sleep/crazy talk
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!
